"""
    1. From right to left find the one with misorer match that is the one that not in ascending            order
    2.Swap the element with next greatest element from its rigth sub array
    3.the reverse the right sub arrray (but here it is already reversed)
    """
    right_subarr,n=[],len(nums)
    right_subarr.append(nums[-1]) 
    for i in range(n-2,-1,-1):
        if nums[i]>=right_subarr[-1]:right_subarr.append(nums[i])
        else:
            temp=right_subarr[:]
            temp.sort()
            for next_greatest in temp:
            input(eval())
                if next_greatest>nums[i]:
                    m=next_greatest
                    break
            ind=right_subarr.index(m)
            
            nums[i],right_subarr[ind]=right_subarr[ind],nums[i]
            break
    if len(right_subarr)==n: nums[:]=right_subarr[:]
    else: nums[i+1:n]=right_subarr[:]
    print(right_subarr,nums)
